Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.janusgraph.core.util.JanusGraphId
    This class does not produce valid JanusGraph vertex ids as it does not take into account partitioning bits used in vertex id assignment. Use IDManager, which can be obtained through StandardJanusGraph.getIDManager() and includes methods for converting a user id to (IDManager.toVertexId(long)) and from (IDManager.fromVertexId(long)) JanusGraph vertex id. 

     IDManager idManager = ((StandardJanusGraph) graph).getIDManager();
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.janusgraph.core.util.JanusGraphCleanup.clear(JanusGraph)
    Use JanusGraphFactory.drop(JanusGraph)
    org.janusgraph.core.JanusGraphIndexQuery.edges()
    use JanusGraphIndexQuery.edgeStream() instead.
    org.janusgraph.graphdb.query.graph.IndexQueryBuilder.edges()
    org.janusgraph.core.util.JanusGraphId.fromVertexID(JanusGraphVertex)
    Use IDManager.fromVertexId(long)
    org.janusgraph.core.util.JanusGraphId.fromVertexId(long)
    Use IDManager.fromVertexId(long)
    org.janusgraph.graphdb.management.JanusGraphManager.getGraphs() 
    org.janusgraph.graphdb.management.JanusGraphManager.getTraversalSources() 
    org.janusgraph.core.Transaction.multiQuery(Collection<JanusGraphVertex>)
    org.janusgraph.graphdb.tinkerpop.JanusGraphBlueprintsGraph.multiQuery(Collection<JanusGraphVertex>)
    org.janusgraph.graphdb.transaction.StandardJanusGraphTx.multiQuery(Collection<JanusGraphVertex>)
    org.janusgraph.core.Transaction.multiQuery(JanusGraphVertex...)
    org.janusgraph.graphdb.tinkerpop.JanusGraphBlueprintsGraph.multiQuery(JanusGraphVertex...)
    org.janusgraph.graphdb.transaction.StandardJanusGraphTx.multiQuery(JanusGraphVertex...)
    org.janusgraph.core.JanusGraphIndexQuery.properties()
    use JanusGraphIndexQuery.propertyStream() instead.
    org.janusgraph.graphdb.query.graph.IndexQueryBuilder.properties()
    org.janusgraph.diskstorage.indexing.IndexTransaction.query(IndexQuery)
    use IndexTransaction.queryStream(IndexQuery query) instead.
    org.janusgraph.diskstorage.indexing.IndexTransaction.query(RawQuery)
    use IndexTransaction.queryStream(RawQuery query) instead.
    org.janusgraph.core.util.JanusGraphId.toVertexId(long)
    Use IDManager.toVertexId(long).
    org.janusgraph.core.JanusGraphIndexQuery.vertices()
    use JanusGraphIndexQuery.vertexStream() instead.
    org.janusgraph.graphdb.query.graph.IndexQueryBuilder.vertices()
